name: Hydravid
author: hydravid

sections.description: This plugin posts videos, title and description via the Hydravid Syndicate app. It also enables your WordPress site to become a part of the Hydravid Syndicate network, in turn, allowing you to post to other WordPress sites.
sections.installation:
1. Upload hydravid directory to the /wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add your Hydravid username (email) and License ID where prompted
sections.faq:
How do I use the plugin?

Once the plugin is installed, you can post to your blog via http://app.hydravid.com.

short_description: This plugin posts videos, title and description via the Hydravid Syndicate app.
